## Client.sync() method

`sync` pushes local changes of the attached documents to the Agent and receives changes of the remote replica from the agent then apply them to local documents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sync(): Promise<Array<DocumentReplica<unknown>>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Array&lt;[DocumentReplica](./yorkie-js-sdk.documentreplica.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown&gt;&gt;&gt;
